moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bd3: Not a great move, It blocks in the QP and doesn't have many squares to go to.
moves.3... Nf6 4. O-O Bc5 5. c4: Taking some more control of the center
moves.5... d6: Now I'm ready to develop my LSB
moves.6. Nc3 Bg4 7. h3 Bxf3 8. gxf3: This is another not-so-great move as it blows open the kingside cover. This move is part of the reason I was able to get mate.
moves.9. a4: I don't know what this move is supposed to do
moves.10. Nd5 Qe6: ?? This is probably one of the worst moves I could have played. This not only undefends my pawn, but turns it into a fork if he captures it.
moves.11... Qd7: Better would have been taking his pawn
